publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2258 Peter Peacock: Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson*

S2M-2258 Peter Peacock: Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson
